alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Rockingham, Strafford, northwestern Hillsborough, southeastern Belknap, southeastern Merrimack and southeastern Carroll Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Laconia to near Concord to near Weare. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Concord, Rochester, Laconia, Durham, Henniker, Northwood, Dover, Hooksett, Somersworth, Barrington, Berwick, Farmington, Epping, Lebanon, Hopkinton, Loudon, Alton, Barnstead, and Epsom. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 10 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 93 between mile markers 25 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southwestern Maine...and central, northern and southern New Hampshire.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
